questions.question_text: Nirvikalp uttam ati, nischay tav ___________; Māhātmya-gnān-yukt bhakti tav, ekāntik sukh ḍhām.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is 'Ghanshyām' as it appears verbatim in the provided kirtan.

questions.question_text: Mohime tav ___________, tāme koī prakār; Dosh na rahe koī jātko, suniyo Dharmakumār.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is 'bhaktapano' as it appears verbatim in the provided kirtan.

questions.question_text: Tumāro tav Hari bhaktako, droh kabu nahi hoy; ___________ tav dāsko, dīje samāgam moy.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is 'kāntik' as it appears verbatim in the provided kirtan.

questions.question_text: Nāth nīrantar darsh tav, tav dāsanko dās; Ehī māgu karī vinay Hari, ___________ rākhiyo pās.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is 'sadā' as it appears verbatim in the provided kirtan.

questions.question_text: He Krupālo! He Bhaktapte! Bhaktavatsal! suno bāt; Dayāsindho! stavan karī, ___________ sāt.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is 'māgu vastu' as it appears verbatim in the provided kirtan.

questions.question_text: Sahajānand Mahārājke, sab satsangī sujāṇ; Tāku hoy dradh vartano, ___________ pramāṇ.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is 'Shikshāpatrī' as it appears verbatim in the provided kirtan.

questions.question_text: So Patrī me atibaḍe, niyam ekādash joy; Tākī vigti kahat hu, suniyo sab ___________ proy.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is 'chitt' as it appears verbatim in the provided kirtan.

questions.question_text: Hinsā na karnī jantukī, partriyā sangko tyāg; Māns na khāvat madhyaku, ___________ nahi badbhāg.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is 'pīvat' as it appears verbatim in the provided kirtan.

questions.question_text: Vidhvāku sparshat nahi, karat na ātmaghat; Chori na karnī kāhukī, ___________ kouku lagāt.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is 'kalank na' as it appears verbatim in the provided kirtan.

questions.question_text: Nindat nahi koy devku, bin khapto nahi khāt; Vimukh jīvake vadanse, ___________ nahi jāt.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is 'kathā sunī' as it appears verbatim in the provided kirtan.
